verses.text: \w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Siceleg, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* fled \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Cia, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* excellent \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w*,

Bending \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* using either \w hand|strong="H3231"\w* \w in|strong="H0251"\w* hurling \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w with|strong="H0068"\w* slings, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* shooting \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*: \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3058"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Joas, \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Samaa \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gabaath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jaziel, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Phallet \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azmoth, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Beracha, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* an \w Anathothite|strong="H6069"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1368"\w* Samaias \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Gabaon, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* stoutest amongst \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w and|strong="H1368"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*; Jeremias, \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Jeheziel, \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Johanan, \w and|strong="H1368"\w* Jezabad \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Gaderoth;

\w And|strong="H3414"\w* Eluzai, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Jerimuth, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Baalia, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Samaria, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Saphatia \w the|strong="H3414"\w* Haruphite;
Elcana, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Jesia, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Azareel, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Joezer, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Jesbaam of Carehim:
\w And|strong="H0511"\w* Joela, \w and|strong="H0511"\w* Zabadia \w the|strong="H0511"\w* sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* Gaddi also there went \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* David, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* hid \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* wilderness \w most|strong="H4480"\w* valiant \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* excellent \w warriors|strong="H1121"\w*, holding shield \w and|strong="H1121"\w* spear: \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* faces \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* faces \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* lion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they \w were|strong="H1121"\w* swift \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* roebucks \w on|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* mountains.
Ezer \w the|strong="H6440"\w* chief, Obdias \w the|strong="H6440"\w* second, Eliab \w the|strong="H6440"\w* third,
Masmana \w the|strong="H0446"\w* fourth, Jeremias \w the|strong="H0446"\w* fifth.
Ethi \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sixth, Eliel \w the|strong="H3414"\w* seventh,
Johanan \w the|strong="H0447"\w* eighth, Elzebad \w the|strong="H0447"\w* ninth,
Jerenias \w the|strong="H3076"\w* tenth, Machbani \w the|strong="H3076"\w* eleventh,

These were \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Gad, captains \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* army: \w the|strong="H3414"\w* least \w of|strong="H3414"\w* them \w was|strong="H3414"\w* captain over a hundred soldiers, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* greatest over a thousand.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* passed \w over|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Jordan \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w* month, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H7218"\w* used \w to|strong="H1121"\w* how \w over|strong="H7218"\w* its banks: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* put \w to|strong="H1121"\w* flight \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* valleys both \w toward|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* east \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w toward|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* west.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w came|strong="H4217"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Benjamin, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Juda \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hold, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* David abode.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* meet \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said: \w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* peaceably \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* help \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, let \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w joined|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*: \w but|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* plot \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* enemies whereas \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* iniquity \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hands, let \w the|strong="H0935"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* fathers \w see|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* judge.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* spirit \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Amasai \w the|strong="H0559"\w* chief \w among|strong="H5921"\w* thirty, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* thine, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* son \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Isai: \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* helpeth thee. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w received|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* captains \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* band.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H7965"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses \w that|strong="H3588"\w* went \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Saul \w to|strong="H5414"\w* fight: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* did \w not|strong="H1732"\w* fight \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lords \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines taking counsel \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* back, saying: \w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* danger \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* return \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* Saul.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Siceleg, there fled \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Manasses, Ednas \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jozabad, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jedihel, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Michael, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Ednas, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Jozabad, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Eliu, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Salathi, \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* thousands \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Manasses.

\w These|strong="H0834"\w* helped David \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* rovers: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* most valiant \w men|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* commanders \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* army.

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* day \w by|strong="H5921"\w* day \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w some|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* till \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* number, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* number \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Hebron, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* transfer \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Saul, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* word \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord.
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda bearing shield \w and|strong="H0935"\w* spear, six thousand eight hundred well appointed \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Simeon valiant \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, seven \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, four \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* six \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Joiada prince \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w race|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w three|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* seven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

Sadoc \w also|strong="H0175"\w* \w a|strong="H7651"\w* young man \w of|strong="H0505"\w* excellent disposition, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* house \w of|strong="H0505"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* father, twenty-two principal men.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w sons|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Benjamin \w the|strong="H6659"\w* brethren \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul, three thousand: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* hitherto \w a|strong="H5288"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* part \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0001"\w* followed \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim twenty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* eight hundred, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* great valour renowned \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* kindreds.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* half tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses, eighteen \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, \w came|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* David king.

\w Also|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Issachar men \w of|strong="H4294"\w* understanding, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* knew \w all|strong="H0505"\w* times \w to|strong="H0935"\w* order \w what|strong="H0834"\w* Israel \w should|strong="H1732"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w*, \w two|strong="H2677"\w* hundred principal men: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w followed|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* counsel.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zabulon \w such|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* stood \w in|strong="H5921"\w* array \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6256"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* armour \w for|strong="H5921"\w* war, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* came fifty thousand \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* aid, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* double heart.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* Nephtali, \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* leaders: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* seven \w and|strong="H3318"\w* thirty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, furnished \w with|strong="H3627"\w* shield \w and|strong="H3318"\w* spear.
\w Of|strong="H8269"\w* Dan \w also|strong="H8269"\w* twenty-eight \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* six hundred prepared \w for|strong="H5973"\w* battle.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Aser forty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* going forth \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* challenging \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* other side \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Jordan \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* sons \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Ruben, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Gad, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* half \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Manasses \w a|strong="H3318"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H3318"\w* twenty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, furnished \w with|strong="H4421"\w* arms \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* well appointed \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*, came \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* perfect heart \w to|strong="H4480"\w* Hebron, \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w*: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w also|strong="H4519"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w*, \w were|strong="H3383"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* three days eating \w and|strong="H0935"\w* drinking: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brethren \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w prepared|strong="H8003"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* far \w as|strong="H1961"\w* Issachar, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* Zabulon, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* Nephtali, \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* leaves \w on|strong="H3117"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* camels, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* mules, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* oxen, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: meal, figs, raisins, wine, oil, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* sheep \w in|strong="H3117"\w* abundance, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* joy \w in|strong="H3117"\w* Israel.
